item.title: From Liam Payne to Coastal Granddaughters, here are the top trending searches for 2024, according to Google
item.dc:creator: Ingrid Lunden
item.description:
Interest in Donald Trump surged higher than interest in Kamala Harris. People ate up content on Dubai chocolate bars. And the Yankees really did win. These are more insights all come from Google annual list of top trending searches, which it’s releasing today.  Google’s place is popular culture today is undisputed. It’s the biggest internet […]

item.title: E-commerce marketplace platform Mirakl acquires ad optimization startup Adspert
item.dc:creator: Romain Dillet
item.description:
French unicorn Mirakl is announcing its third acquisition in three years with the acquisition of Adspert, a German adtech startup focused on e-commerce advertising. Mirakl isn’t disclosing the terms of the acquisition, but the entire Adspert team of 30 employees will join Mirakl. As a reminder, Mirakl originally started as a software solution to add […]

item.title: Automattic acquires WPAI, a startup that makes AI products for WordPress
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description:
WPAI's products include an AI plugin maker, an assistant for site builders, and a chatbot for WordPress-related questions.

item.title: A test for AGI is closer to being solved — but it may be flawed
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
A test for AGI, ARC-AGI, is closer to being solved — but the test may be flawed, its creators, including notable AI figure Francois Chollet, admit.

item.title: Here’s how OpenAI’s fresh new Sora interface looks
item.dc:creator: TC Video
item.description:
OpenAI‘s video generator is here. ChatGPT subscribers can use Sora to generate videos from text, bring images to life, and extend, remix, or blend already existing videos. Here’s what it looks like to test it out — in case you’re still locked out or the servers are down. During a livestream Monday afternoon, OpenAI revealed […]

item.title: Blue Origin says New Glenn on track to launch before end of 2024
item.dc:creator: Aria Alamalhodaei
item.description:
Blue Origin says it’s on track to launch its towering New Glenn vehicle before the year’s end, though the company is still awaiting regulatory approval to conduct a final key test of the massive rocket.  That test, called a “hot fire,” involves powering up all seven of the first stage’s BE-4 engines and firing them […]

item.title: TechCrunch Space: A new world
item.dc:creator: Aria Alamalhodaei
item.description:
Hello, and welcome back to TechCrunch Space! To the shock of no one, ever, NASA announced that the next Artemis mission is delayed to no earlier than April 2026, and the subsequent Artemis III mission is delayed to mid-2027. It will be interesting to see how Artemis changes under Jared Isaacman’s leadership — more on […]

item.title: Amazon forms an AI agent-focused lab led by Adept’s co-founder
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
Amazon says that it’s establishing a new R&D lab in San Francisco, the Amazon AGI SF Lab, to focus on building “foundational” capabilities for AI agents. The Amazon AGI SF Lab will be led by David Luan, the co-founder of AI startup Adept, and will seek to build agents that can “take actions in the […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: OpenAI Startup Fund raises $44M in its largest SPV yet
item.dc:creator: Charles Rollet, Marina Temkin
item.description:
The OpenAI Startup Fund discloses its biggest SPV yet, but is staying quiet on what it's for.

item.title: FTC distributes $72M to Fortnite customers tricked into making unwanted purchases
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description:
The U.S. Federal Trade Commission on Monday announced that it’s sending the first round of payments to consumers tricked by Fortnite maker Epic Games into making unwanted purchases, with refunds totaling over $72 million. The settlement, first announced in December 2022 and finalized in March 2023, fined the game $245 million for its “counterintuitive, inconsistent, […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Spotify has disabled Car Thing streaming devices
item.dc:creator: Lauren Forristal
item.description:
Spotify has officially discontinued Car Thing, its in-car streaming device, with all units now disabled, the company confirmed to TechCrunch.  Earlier today, an X user noticed that their Car Thing is indeed no longer functioning, displaying a message that it’s “no longer operational,” along with a reminder of the refund terms valid until January 14, […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: X says its new image generator, Aurora, will launch for all users within the week
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
X, the Elon Musk-owned social network previously known as Twitter, quietly added a new image generator to its Grok assistant this past Saturday. Then, it removed it. Now, it’s bringing it back — and officially announcing it. The image generator, called Aurora, was developed by Musk’s AI company, xAI, and trained on billions of examples from the […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Fisker resolves federal safety investigation into rollaway risk
item.dc:creator: Kirsten Korosec
item.description:
The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said Monday it has closed a preliminary investigation into Fisker over complaints that its all-electric Ocean SUV rolls away unexpectedly. The U.S. safety regulator opened an investigation in February after receiving four complaints — one of which resulted in an injury — over the failure of the vehicles to […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Why OpenAI is only letting some Sora users create videos of real people
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
OpenAI launched its video-generating tool, Sora, on Monday. But the company’s opting not to release a key feature for most users pending further testing. The feature in question generates a video using an uploaded photo or footage of a real person as a reference. OpenAI says that it’ll give a “subset” of Sora users access […]

item.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers, Cody Corrall, Alyssa Stringer
item.description:
ChatGPT, OpenAI’s text-generating AI chatbot, has taken the world by storm since its launch in November 2022. What started as a tool to hyper-charge productivity through writing essays and code with short text prompts has evolved into a behemoth used by more than 92% of Fortune 500 companies. That growth has propelled OpenAI itself into […]

item.title: OpenAI’s Sora video generator is launching for ChatGPT Pro and Plus subscribers — but not in the EU
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
Subscribers to OpenAI’s ChatGPT Pro and Plus plans will get access to Sora, OpenAI’s video generator, starting today — but only if they live in certain countries. During a livestream Monday afternoon, OpenAI revealed key information about Sora, including technical details. The version launching today, called Sora Turbo, can generate clips between 5 seconds and […]

item.title: Bluesky teases paid subscription, Bluesky+, in new mockup
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description:
Social networking startup and X competitor Bluesky is working on subscriptions. The company first announced plans to develop a new revenue stream based on the subscription model when detailing its $15 million Series A back in October. Now, mockups teasing the upcoming Bluesky subscription, along with a list of possible features, have been published to […]

item.title: Ukraine says Russian hackers are targeting country’s defense contractors
item.dc:creator: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
item.description:
Ukraine’s Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT-UA) said in a report published over the weekend that a hacking group has been targeting the country’s defense and military companies with phishing attacks.  The CERT identified the hacking group as UAC-0185 — also known as UNC4221 — without saying who was behind the group. Earlier this year, however, […]

item.title: OpenAI’s Sora is launching today — here are highlights from the first review
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
Sora, OpenAI’s video generator, is launching Monday — at least for some users. YouTuber Marques Brownlee revealed the news in a video published to his channel this morning. Brownlee got early access to Sora, and gave his initial impressions in a 15-minute review. Sora lives on Sora.com, Brownlee said, the homepage for which shows a […]

item.title: US medical device giant Artivion says hackers stole files during cybersecurity incident
item.dc:creator: Carly Page
item.description:
Artivion, a medical device company that manufactures implantable tissues for cardiac and vascular transplant applications, says its services have been “disrupted” due to a cybersecurity incident.  In an 8-K filing with the SEC on Monday, Georgia-based Artivion, formerly CryoLife, said it became aware of a “cybersecurity incident” that involved the “acquisition and encryption” of data […]
